content:
That's great to hear that you're making an effort to eat healthier and prioritize exercise! Congratulations on stocking up on fruits and vegetables, and kudos on fitting in a 30-minute jog on Saturday morning.

Here are some healthy recipe suggestions for you to try this week:

**Monday:**

* **Grilled Chicken and Veggie Wrap**: Marinate chicken breast in olive oil, salt, and pepper, then grill with sliced bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms. Serve in a whole wheat wrap with mixed greens, hummus, and avocado.

**Tuesday:**

* **Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl**: Cook quinoa and black beans, then top with roasted sweet potatoes, diced tomatoes, and a sprinkle of feta cheese. Add a drizzle of olive oil and a squeeze of lime juice.

**Wednesday:**

* **Baked Salmon with Roasted Vegetables**: Season salmon fillet with lemon juice and herbs, then bake with sliced Brussels sprouts, carrots, and red bell peppers. Serve with brown rice and a side salad.

**Thursday:**

* **Lentil Soup**: Saute onions, garlic, and carrots in olive oil, then add lentils, diced tomatoes, and vegetable broth. Simmer until the lentils are tender, then season with salt and pepper to taste.

**Friday:**

* **Grilled Turkey and Avocado Salad**: Grill sliced turkey breast and serve on top of mixed greens with sliced avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of feta cheese. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

**Saturday:**

* **Veggie Stir-Fry with Tofu**: Stir-fry diced tofu and a variety of colorful vegetables (such as broccoli, bell peppers, and snow peas) in a little olive oil. Serve with brown rice or whole wheat noodles.

**Sunday:**

* **Breakfast for Dinner**: Scramble eggs with spinach and mushrooms, then serve with whole wheat toast and a side of sautéed cherry tomatoes.

Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day, and feel free to adjust the portion sizes and ingredients based on your personal preferences and dietary needs.

Enjoy your healthy meal prep, and keep up the great work on your fitness journey!
